Package fr.ferret.model.conversions

Class VcfConverter

java.lang.Object
fr.ferret.model.conversions.VcfConverter
public final class VcfConverter extends Object
The util class to convert `.vcf` files.

  • Method Details

    • generateVariantId

      public static String generateVariantId(htsjdk.variant.variantcontext.VariantContext ctx)
      Generates a new ID for a variant with an empty id ".". The generated ID will follow the chromosome:position format.

    • toFrq

      public static String toFrq(VcfObject vcf, String outPath) throws IOException
      Writes a Frq file from a VcfObject.
      Parameters:
      vcf - The VcfObject to convert to Frq
      outPath - The path to write the Frq file to
      Throws:
      IOException
